name: Bear in Super Action Adventure
summary:
Bear in Super Action Adventure is a side-scrolling shoot 'em up game in which you play as a bear that needs to save his planet from the evil Green rabbit and his minions.

Each mission you have to navigate bear through the attacking hordes of Green rabbit and destroy enemies while shooting automatically. Enemies include bees, bats and bosses. Along the way money can be collected. With this money you can buy upgrades like more bullets, increased bullet damage, more health, faster movement, power shots and a shield. The game offers 20 stages and a number of achievements that can be earned.
